```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#importing dataset

data <- read.csv("BankChurners.csv")

```

```{r}
#percentage of total customers that have attrited

data %>%
  count(Attrition_Flag) %>%
  mutate(percent = n / sum(n) * 100)

```

```{r}
#summary of attrited customers
attrited_customers <- data %>% filter(Attrition_Flag == "Attrited Customer")
existing_customers <- data %>% filter(Attrition_Flag == "Existing Customer")


summary(attrited_customers)

ggplot(data, aes(x = Customer_Age, color = Attrition_Flag)) +
  geom_histogram(fill = "white", binwidth = 1) +
  geom_density(alpha = .2, fill = 'green')

```
